name: Abyssal Frontier
description:
!!!THIS GAME HAS BODY HORROR,GORE AND TRYPOPHOBIA WARNING!!!
You're just a normal Captain, trying to finish your cargo run and earn some well-deserved shore leave.
Your crew is solid, even if you have a newbie onboard. You've done this dozens of times.

Oh? A new toy to play with.

All you have to do is visit this last outpost, and you'll be done for a good, long, while.
One more jump.
One more Sale.

We'll see about that.

After all, this is just a normal run...

Features:
  • Voice Acting

  • Handdrawn Backgrounds and Art

  • Amazing Soundtrack by the talented Keno Nifty!

  • Time Loop Mechanics

  • Multiple Endings

  • A Dating Sim Mode?Of course not. That would be silly

Loosely inspired by Junji Ito's "Hellstar Remina" and games from the Zero Escape Series, this game immerses you in a nightmare where an eldritch planet hungers for your very essence. Will you succumb to the insidious influence of the eldritch planet, or can you find a way to break free from the cyclical nightmare?
